enWisdom: Repelling anger with forbearance is the fruit of knowledge
Forbearance is the fruit of knowledge

Wisdom: تَجَرَّعْ مَضَضَ الْحِلْمِ فَإِنَّهُ رَأْسُ الْحِكْمَةِ وَثَمَرَةُ الْعِلْمِ
enWisdom: Gulp down the pains of forbearance, for indeed it is the cornerstone of wisdom and the fruit of knowledge
Espouse forbearance for verily it is the fruit of knowledge
Forbearance is the embellishment of knowledge
Forbearance is the ornament of knowledge and the cause of peace
The cause of fear [of Allah] is knowledge
How good a companion of forbearance knowledge is!
The dignity of forbearance is the adornment of knowledge
Virtuous forbearance is a sign of abundant knowledge
The cornerstone of knowledge is forbearance

Wisdom: مَنِ ارْتَوَى مِنْ مَشْرَبِ الْعِلْمِ تَجَلْبَبَ جِلْبَابَ الْحِلْمِ
enWisdom: One who increases his study of knowledge [and discussion about what he has learnt] does not forget what he knows and benefits from it that which he does not know
He who enlivens knowledge does not die
The best vizier of knowledge is forbearance

Wisdom: لَا عِلْمَ لِمَنْ لَا حِلْمَ لَهُ
enWisdom: One who has no forbearance has no knowledge
